snippet.title: Dethroned - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the free demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2326050/Dethroned/

Unleash your inner ruler in Dethroned - an army-building roguelike with short runs, tactical but dynamic fights and infinite possibilities. Choose a mage, hone unique abilities, hunt for spells and artifacts. Explore an unpredictable world, grow influence and forge alliances to reclaim the throne.

Dethroned is a game that combines a mix of genres: roguelike army builder with an RPG and auto-battle elements.
